name: part_005
file: tmp_【#⁠湊あくあ5周年LIVE】Dreamy day 【湊あくあ⧸ホロライブ】 [c9VW0E2Unl4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: The group performance of 'Gofunbun no Kimochi' concludes.
A visual novel style transition scene featuring Aqua, Suisei, and Towa preparing for their next song.

subtitles.original: We are the bride
subtitles.english: We are the bride

subtitles.original: We are the bride
subtitles.english: We are the bride

subtitles.original: Free!
subtitles.english: Free!

subtitles.original: あくたん、あくたん、あくあくあくたん！
subtitles.english: Akutan, Akutan, Aku-aku-akutan!

subtitles.original: ちょっとこの人うるさいんですけど
subtitles.english: This person is being a little loud...

subtitles.original: あくたん準備OK？
subtitles.english: Akutan, are you ready?

subtitles.original: ふふ、二人とも緊張しなさすぎ
subtitles.english: Hehe, you two aren't nervous at all.

subtitles.original: よし、行こうか
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go.

subtitles.original: No title
subtitles.english: No title

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲: Reol 編曲: Giga
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Music: Reol, Arrangement: Giga

subtitles.original: ずっと夢見てた僕になれたかな
subtitles.english: Did I become the person I always dreamed of?

subtitles.original: とうに帰れないとこまで来たみたい
subtitles.english: Seems I've come too far to return now.

subtitles.original: 自分の足で二段飛ばして
subtitles.english: Skipping two steps at a time with my own feet,

subtitles.original: さあもっと先へ駆けていけるはずだから runaway
subtitles.english: I should be able to run even further, so runaway.

subtitles.original: 深くなる傷を縫い付け
subtitles.english: Stitching up the deepening wounds,

subtitles.original: 繋ぐパッチワーク回りだす
subtitles.english: The connecting patchwork begins to turn.

subtitles.original: 慣れた痛み 焦る呼吸とビート
subtitles.english: Familiar pain, hurried breaths and the beat,

subtitles.original: 気付かないフリしてまた一人
subtitles.english: Pretending not to notice, alone once again.

subtitles.original: 何が正当？ ないな永劫
subtitles.english: What is correct? Not for eternity,

subtitles.original: 誰が間違った対価払うの
subtitles.english: Who will pay the price for mistakes?

subtitles.original: あんたが嫌いなあいつはきっと
subtitles.english: That person you hate is surely...

subtitles.original: ただ「これ」が好きで不正解なんだ
subtitles.english: Just an incorrect answer for liking 'this'.

subtitles.original: 0点だって提言したって
subtitles.english: Even if declared a zero-point score,

subtitles.original: 全然納得できない理由も
subtitles.english: There's no reason I'd ever agree.

subtitles.original: 最前線はいつだってここだった
subtitles.english: The front line was always right here.

subtitles.original: 最善策は最初からなかった
subtitles.english: There was never a best plan from the start.

subtitles.original: 緩やかに崩れ壊れてく
subtitles.english: Slowly collapsing and breaking apart.

subtitles.original: ゆらりゆらり首を締めるように
subtitles.english: Swaying as if tightening a noose,

subtitles.original: 昨日までの僕が殺されていく
subtitles.english: The me of yesterday is being killed.

subtitles.original: 緩やかに離れ離れ飽く
subtitles.english: Slowly drifting apart, getting tired of it.

subtitles.original: ぐらりりき君に聞こえるのは
subtitles.english: Wavering, what you hear

subtitles.original: 僕が知らない声になっていく
subtitles.english: Is becoming a voice I don't recognize.

subtitles.original: 幼い頃から
subtitles.english: Since I was young,

subtitles.original: 気付いたらそばにいた
subtitles.english: When I realized, you were by my side.

subtitles.original: まるで空気のようだ
subtitles.english: Just like the very air,

subtitles.original: 僕は君とぎゅっと手を繋いで
subtitles.english: I held your hand so tightly.

subtitles.original: 楽しいことも涙も
subtitles.english: The happy times and the tears,

subtitles.original: 僕は君に話して聞かせた
subtitles.english: I told you all about them.

subtitles.original: 僕を笑う人 貶す声が
subtitles.english: So the voices that laughed and mocked me

subtitles.original: 聞こえないように君は歌った
subtitles.english: Wouldn't be heard, you sang for me.

subtitles.original: この声を君が受信
subtitles.english: You receive this voice,

subtitles.original: また夜ごと投影されてく憂い
subtitles.english: And every night, the sorrow is projected.

subtitles.original: 使い捨てだって言って腐っても
subtitles.english: Even if called disposable and rotting away,

subtitles.original: 止まらないハイファイ・ファイ・フィスト
subtitles.english: The high-fi-fi-fist won't stop.

subtitles.original: 一周巡る間の
subtitles.english: In the time it takes for one rotation,

subtitles.original: たった一瞬だけでも
subtitles.english: Even if for just a single moment,

subtitles.original: 交わる鼓動、音、繋ぐ色
subtitles.english: The meeting heartbeat, sound, and connecting colors.

subtitles.original: 次は僕が君に歌うから
subtitles.english: Because next time, I'll be the one singing to you.

subtitles.original: 緩やかに崩れ壊れてく
subtitles.english: Slowly collapsing and breaking apart.

subtitles.original: ゆらりゆらり首を締めるように
subtitles.english: Swaying as if tightening a noose,

subtitles.original: 昨日までの僕が殺されていく
subtitles.english: The me of yesterday is being killed.

subtitles.original: 緩やかに離れ離れ飽く
subtitles.english: Slowly drifting apart, getting tired of it.

subtitles.original: ぐらりりき君に聞こえるのは
subtitles.english: Wavering, what you hear

subtitles.original: 僕が知らない声になっていく
subtitles.english: Is becoming a voice I don't recognize.

subtitles.english: Slowly collapsing and breaking apart.

subtitles.original: ゆらりゆらり首を締めるように
subtitles.english: Swaying as if tightening a noose,

subtitles.original: 昨日までの僕が殺されていく
subtitles.english: The me of yesterday is being killed.

subtitles.original: 緩やかに離れ離れ飽く
subtitles.english: Slowly drifting apart, getting tired of it.

subtitles.original: ぐらりりき君に聞こえるのは
subtitles.english: Wavering, what you hear

subtitles.original: 僕が知らない声になっていく
subtitles.english: Is becoming a voice I don't recognize.

subtitles.original: いつか君に届くかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if it'll reach you someday.

subtitles.original: いやそんな日はきっと来ないだろうな
subtitles.english: No, that day will surely never come.

subtitles.original: 声も体も持たぬ君に
subtitles.english: By you, who has neither voice nor body,

subtitles.original: 救われた何億人の一人
subtitles.english: I am just one of hundreds of millions saved.

subtitles.original: 赤青黄合わせ彩った
subtitles.english: Combining red, blue, and yellow to color it,

subtitles.original: 音で世界が溢れた
subtitles.english: The world overflowed with sound.

subtitles.original: 巡り巡り出会ったこの音を聴く
subtitles.english: I listen to this sound found through twists and turns.

subtitles.original: すべてが
subtitles.english: Everything...

subtitles.original: 緩やかに崩れ壊れてく
subtitles.english: Slowly collapsing and breaking apart.

subtitles.original: ゆらりゆらり首を締めるように
subtitles.english: Swaying as if tightening a noose,

subtitles.english: The me of yesterday is being killed.

subtitles.english: Is becoming a voice I don't recognize.
